item.description:
Hello & Welcome! Joining this group is an opportunity for you to meet, socialize and make new friends in and around the Willimantic and Storrs/Mansfield area.
What do we do? A little of everything. So far people have expressed an interest in coffee, hiking, dining, music, walking, snowshoeing/skiing and photography. If you're interested in a particular activity, contact one of the group organizers or post on the message board, and we will see what we can do about finding out who else in the group might be interested in getting a meetup together for this activity.
So whether you're new in town, single, vacationing or just want to meet some interesting and fun people, you are invited to join!
item.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group
